targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /${host}/ and
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and  r.host == "${host}" and r._field == "usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r: r.usage_idle * -1.0 + 100.0}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_frequency")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

//SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_softirq" or r._field == "steal" or r._field == "usage_nice" or r._field == "usage_irq"  or r._field == "usage_iowait"  or r._field == "usage_guest"  or r._field == "guest_nice")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu =~ /$cpu$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

  from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent" or r._field == "cached" or r._field == "free" or r._field == "buffered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] =~ /cpu[0-9].*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with usage_idle: 100.0 - r.usage_idle}))

//SELECT mean(running) as running, mean(blocked) as blocked, mean(sleeping) as sleeping, mean(stopped) as stopped, mean(zombies) as zombies, mean(paging) as paging, mean(unknown) as unknown FROM "processes" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc


from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "running" or r["_field"] == "blocked" or r["_field"] == "sleeping" or r["_field"] == "zombies" or r["_field"] == "paging" or r["_field"] == "unknown")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kernel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "context_switches")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path", "device", "fstype" fill(null)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.device =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "in" or r["_field"] == "out" or r["_field"] == "swap")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_time")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_time")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)

  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.name =~ /$disk$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.interface =~ /$interface$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.interface =~ /$interface$/)

  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_outrsts), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_outrsts")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_activeopens), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_activeopens")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")

  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_passiveopens), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.interface =~ /$interface$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "drop_in")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.interface =~ /$interface$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "drop_out")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.interface =~ /$interface$/)

  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}" and r.interface =~ /$interface$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "err_out")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
